name: GraveYard Shift (itch) (Noahlencioni)
description:
I made this for Devtober 2022 to work on my capabilities to create different kinds of systems within a game world such as:

- Weapons System/Cycling

- Shop/Upgrade system

- Enemy Spawning System/Wave System

Please let me know on how I can improve the game.

I am currently working on improving the Game Over Menu
